proposition: Zone 2 cardio is a critical component of improving overall fitness and health.
This type of cardio exercise elevates the heart rate and breathing to a level where individuals can still hold a conversation without struggling to speak.
It is recommended that individuals aim for a minimum of 150 to 200 minutes of zone 2 cardio per week to promote cardiovascular and cerebrovascular health.
Incorporating zone 2 cardio into the weekly routine can significantly benefit physical well-being.
One effective way to integrate zone 2 cardio is by scheduling specific sessions, such as a long jog or hike once a week.
